scenario.description:
This scenario puts one squadron of B-17 bombers over the Marin Ranch Airport, CA35.
Your mission is to down the bombers
The bombers are headed in a northerly direction first squadron at 5100 feet and near the B-17's optimal crusing speed of 182 knots.
The B-17s are air-to-air targets. You can damage them with heavy guns, machine guns, or other armament.
To damage the aircraft takes one or more direct hits from a machine gun or heavy gun, or a close strike by a heavy bomb.
Install this scenario in the FlightGear/data/AI directory.
Suggestion: Turn multiplayer mode off. Marin Ranch is close to KSFO and you'll pick up all the multiplayer action there, greatly slowing your framerate.
Any aircraft that shoots guns or drops bombs can damage the B-17. A great choice is to use the A6M2 aircraft included in this distribution.
(And OK - Zeros covering B-17s isn't exactly historically accurate - but this scenario illustrates what the Bombable package can do now.)
